about_the_game:
■Story
An ordinary school girl, "Ryo=Rurube", suddenly...
She has transformed into her transformation battle heroine "Fresh Charge RURU"

Protect the peace of the city from the clutches of the evil army "BELF"

Let's go! RURU!
Kick away evil with your natural energy and deadly flying kicks!

■Game system
・Easy-to-operate turn-based action
No complicated operations required! Just decide the direction of your flying kick and shoot it.
Exhilarating side-view action where you can scatter enemies in all directions!

・Growth elements with abundant techniques and strengthening items
Freely acquire skills by allocating "Build Pnt." obtained by leveling up.
Combine with strengthening items and take on difficult stages and giant bosses with the most optimal build!

・2D characters that move smoothly
Characters move smoothly using a technology called "2D Animation".
Let's enjoy the action and story woven by such characters!

She has transformed into her transformation battle heroine "Fresh Charge RURU"

・Growth elements with abundant techniques and strengthening items
Freely acquire skills by allocating "Build Pnt." obtained by leveling up.
Combine with strengthening items and take on difficult stages and giant bosses with the most optimal build!

・2D characters that move smoothly
Characters move smoothly using a technology called "2D Animation".
Let's enjoy the action and story woven by such characters!

name: Fresh Charge RURU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Schoolgirl ”Ryo=Rurube” transforms into battle heroine "Fresh Charge RURU" to combat the evil army "BELF", safeguarding city peace with deadly flying kicks! Grow stronger with skill and items, conquer stages, and defeat huge bosses in this cute yet powerful side-view turn-based action game!
